title: Collaborative Design Utilizing Evaluation Data from Multicultural/Low-Income School Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis skills and understanding of educational assessment concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening collaborative learning design capabilities using assessment data from multicultural/low-income school settings

learning_goals: Analyze evaluation data from multicultural and low-income schools through learner collaboration to derive at least three educational improvement strategies.
Apply a collaborative knowledge-building process to create at least one lesson design scenario.
Simulate the knowledge mediation process among diverse stakeholders to propose at least two conflict management strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
